thread.title: 17 Things You'll Get If Nobody Thinks You're Funny Except For You
thread.title_full: 17 Things You'll Get If Nobody Thinks You're Funny Except For You

author: Kat Angus
title: 17 Things You'll Get If Nobody Thinks You're Funny Except For You
text:
View this image › 
awinchesterwithabox.tumblr.com ID: 10663660 3. Because when you come up with something that is PURE GOLD, nobody else seems to appreciate it. View this image › 
tonyaustin6 / Via reddit.com ID: 10663629 4. Even when you know your joke is terrible, you tell it anyway, because it’s so terrible that it’s actually great. View this image › 
TheTrickIsNothing / Via i.imgur.com ID: 10664559 5. You’re not afraid to ruin what should be a happy occasion… View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10665426 6. …Or a romantic moment… View this image › 
residentjared / Via reddit.com ID: 10665343 7. …All for the sake of what you think — no, what you know is a brilliant joke. View this image › 
Twitter: @mynameisntdave ID: 10664720 8. Because pretty often, you’d rather troll than be helpful. View this image › 
aperson33 / Via reddit.com ID: 10664750 9. You may spend a lot of time and effort for a gag that will elicit nothing more than an eye-roll from your loved ones. View this image › 
timelymanner85 / Via reddit.com ID: 10665430 10. And sometimes your jokes get your loved ones in trouble. (Which just makes it even funnier.) (To you.) View this image › 
AloneMordakai / Via reddit.com ID: 10663734 11. When one of your quips doesn’t get the reaction you want, you keep trying, determined to make it work. View this image › 
piranha_teeth / Via reddit.com ID: 10664823 12. In fact, you’ll just double down on it, because even if they don’t like it, you know it’s funny. View this image › 
bebop10 / Via reddit.com ID: 10663701 13. And you’re genuinely surprised when those closest to you don’t find your antics amusing. View this image › 
Twitter: @5eean ID: 10665044 14. If you’re honest, though, your sense of humor has probably hindered you at times. View this image › 
Twitter: @AndyAsAdjective ID: 10664118 15. Because you can’t always turn it off — even when you want to. View this image › 
Twitter: @annakendrick47 ID: 10664858 16. But even if you’re the only one who ever laughs at your dumb jokes, that’s fine with you. View this image › 
headmonkeys / Via imgur.com ID: 10665691 17. Because ultimately, you know that you’re a comedic genius whose brilliance is simply not appreciated in your own time. View this image › 
Twitter: @xx_Adoredyamond ID: 10665363 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Kat Angus is a staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Toronto.
